name: Your Eyes
description:
CO-OP only game, that requires controller!

So love is about two persons similarly to this game. Here you have to be patient to each other, go through this challenge together and sacrifice for your love.

Controls:

  1. Keybord+Mouse
    1. Move: W+A+S+D
    2. Jump: Spase
    3. Shoot: Left Mouse Button
  2. Controller
    1. Move: Left Stick, D Pad
    2. Jump: Left Trigger, X
    3. Shoot: Right Trigger
